title: Deduplicate GenerationType enum
description: GenerationType is defined in both src/api/models/requests.py:7-12 and src/api/models/responses.py:18-23. Move to a shared location and import from there.

title: Test full illustration pipeline with Nano Banana Pro
description: Run end-to-end test generating an illustrated story. Verify character consistency across all pages.

title: Flatten modules/qa_metrics/ into modules/
description: Move vlm_judge.py and vqa_scorer.py from modules/qa_metrics/ directly into modules/. Delete the qa_metrics/ subdirectory. Update all imports accordingly. Premature nesting hurts discoverability - keep flat until 10+ related files.

title: Add Nano Banana Pro config to config.py
description: Add get_image_lm() function returning gemini-3-pro-image-preview model. Add GOOGLE_API_KEY to env loading.

title: Create DSPy modules
description: Implement OutlineGenerator, PageGenerator, and QualityJudge modules in src/modules/

title: Test QA pipeline end-to-end
description: Generate illustrated story with QA enabled, verify regeneration works

title: Create job manager and story service
description: Create src/api/services/ with job_manager.py and story_service.py

title: Split config.py into focused modules
description:
Split the monolithic config.py into separate concerns:
- src/config/llm.py - LLM providers, fallbacks, configure_dspy()
- src/config/story.py - Story constants (page count, word limits, etc.)
- src/config/image.py - Nano Banana/Gemini image generation setup
Create src/config/__init__.py with convenient re-exports.

title: Add CharacterBible to story outline
description: Extend StoryOutlineSignature to output structured character definitions with locked visual attributes (face, hair, clothing, colors, age, style tags) for each character

title: Add executable examples directory
description:
Create examples/ directory with 2-3 working examples showing real outputs:
- examples/simple_story/ - Basic story without illustrations
- examples/illustrated_story/ - Story with character sheets and page illustrations
Include the generated JSON/text outputs and a README explaining each example. Real outputs are better than documentation.

title: Move src/ to backend/ using git mv
description: Use git mv to move: src/api/ → backend/api/, src/modules/ → backend/core/modules/, src/signatures/ → backend/core/signatures/, src/programs/ → backend/core/programs/, src/types.py → backend/core/types.py, src/config/ → backend/config/, src/metrics/ → backend/metrics/, src/optimization/ → backend/optimization/. Copy src/__init__.py content to backend/core/__init__.py (it re-exports types).

title: Create database schema and connection
description: Create src/api/database/ with schema.sql, db.py, repository.py

title: Create VLMJudge wrapper module
description: Use Gemini 2.0 Flash for detailed checks: text-free, character consistency, composition

title: Remove global state from LM configuration
description:
Refactor modules to accept LM explicitly rather than relying on global configure_dspy() state:
1. Add optional lm parameter to module __init__ methods
2. Use passed LM or fall back to get_default_lm()
3. This enables easier testing and avoids order-of-import issues
Example: def __init__(self, lm: dspy.LM = None): self.lm = lm or get_default_lm()

title: Create VQAScorer wrapper module
description: Wrap t2v-metrics VQAScore for fast alignment checking

title: Connect frontend to FastAPI backend
description: Create features/stories/api.ts with TanStack Query hooks: useStories, useStory, useCreateStory, useStoryJob. Configure API base URL for dev/prod

title: Set up DSPy configuration
description: Create src/config.py with LM setup using load_dotenv(), dual-model architecture for inference and reflection

title: Update API models and database for spreads
description: Update StoryResponse, StoryPageResponse → StorySpreadResponse. Update database schema (story_pages → story_spreads). Add migration for llm_model column if needed.

title: Add illustration_prompt to page writer
description: Extend PageWriterSignature to output illustration_prompt field describing scene visually: character poses, expressions, environment, composition

title: Create main ImageQA module
description: Hybrid QA with fast pass (VQAScore) + detailed pass (VLM) + regeneration logic

title: Convert story_service.py relative imports to absolute
description: In src/api/services/story_service.py, convert the relative imports (from ...programs.story_generator, from ...config) to absolute imports. This prevents breakage when directory depth changes. Must be done BEFORE moving src/ to backend/.

title: Implement ErrorScreen
description: Port error-screen.jsx to app/+not-found.tsx and components/ErrorScreen.tsx. Contextual error messages, retry/go-home buttons, sad sparkles animation

title: Add Makefile for common commands
description:
Create a Makefile (or justfile) documenting common commands:
- make run - Generate a story with default goal
- make debug - Run debug script
- make optimize - Run GEPA optimization
- make test - Run tests (when added)
This serves as executable documentation and clarifies entry points.

title: Remove redundant is_illustrated flag
description: GeneratedStory.is_illustrated and generation_type convey the same info. If generation_type == 'illustrated', is_illustrated is always True. Consider deriving one from the other or removing the redundant field. Affected: src/types.py:308, src/api/models/responses.py:90, src/api/database/schema.sql:12, src/api/services/story_service.py

title: Configure fonts + haptics
description: Install expo-font, expo-haptics. Bundle Nunito and Baloo 2 fonts. Create useHaptics hook for button/page feedback

title: Centralize dataclasses into types.py
description: Create src/types.py containing all domain dataclasses currently scattered across modules: StoryOutline, CharacterBible, StoryPage, QualityJudgment, GeneratedStory, ImageQAResult, RegenerationRequest, StyleDefinition, CharacterReferenceSheet, StoryReferenceSheets. Update all imports. This makes data flow obvious at a glance.

title: Set up NativeWind v4 + Tailwind
description: Install nativewind@4.1.x, tailwindcss@3.4.x, configure babel/metro, port tailwind.config.js from prototypes (keyframes, animations)

title: Enhance creation loading screen
description: Add 9 whimsical stages, rotating character emoji, bobbing animation, floating decorations, magic particles, user prompt echo, theme badge, stage history icons, gradient progress bar, Read Your Story button

title: Simplify SpreadGenerator module
description: Replace page-by-page generation loop with single LLM call using FullStorySignature. Parse output into 12 StorySpread objects. Remove per-page critique loop (rely on story-level quality check).

title: Update story_generator to use new illustration modules
description: Update generate_illustrated() method in story_generator.py to work with the rewritten Nano Banana Pro modules.

title: Add FastAPI dependencies
description: Add fastapi, uvicorn, aiosqlite to pyproject.toml

title: Create FastAPI routes and app
description: Create src/api/routes/stories.py and src/api/main.py

title: Clean up and verify restructure
description: Delete all __pycache__ directories. Run 'poetry install' to refresh. Run 'poetry run pytest tests/' to verify all tests pass. Run 'make api' to verify API starts. Run 'make run GOAL=test' to verify CLI works. Fix any issues found.

title: Enhance new story input screen
description: Add floating decorations, gradient theme pills, wiggle animation on create button, inspiration tip box, gradient title text

title: Remove VQAScorer and related code
description:
VQAScorer is not being used. Remove:
- src/modules/vqa_scorer.py
- VQAScorer/FastPassResult exports from modules/__init__.py
- VQAScorer imports and fallback code from image_qa.py
- Any t2v_metrics dependency references

title: Update pyproject.toml with pytest pythonpath config
description: Add [tool.pytest.ini_options] section with pythonpath = ['.'] to ensure consistent import behavior across environments.

title: Create Expo SDK 53 frontend
description: iPad-first children's story app with landscape orientation. Stack: Expo SDK 53, Expo Router v5, NativeWind v4, TanStack Query v5, Zustand, Reanimated v3 + Moti

title: Initialize Expo SDK 53 project
description: Run npx create-expo-app, configure app.json for iPad landscape (requireFullScreen: true, supportsTablet: true), set up TypeScript

title: Rewrite character_sheet_generator for Nano Banana Pro
description: Replace gpt-image-1 turnaround sheet generation with Nano Banana Pro portrait generation. Generate 1-2 simple reference portraits per character instead of 4-view turnarounds.

title: Remove empty placeholder directories
description: Remove data/ and optimized/ directories (just contain .gitkeep files). These can be recreated when actually needed for GEPA optimization.

title: Create API runner script
description: Create scripts/run_api.py

title: Refactor story generation to spread-based approach
description: Replace page-by-page generation with spread-based approach. 12 spreads, 200-400 words total, one illustration per spread. Generated all at once with Claude Opus 4.5.

title: Implement StoryLibrary screen
description: Port story-library.jsx to app/index.tsx. Grid of StoryCards, filter tabs (All/New/Reading/Done), floating decorations, 'New Story' button

title: Implement StoryReader screen
description: Port story-reader.jsx to app/read/[id].tsx. Side-by-side illustration+text layout, page navigation, progress dots, settings dropdown, swipe gestures

title: Integrate QA into PageIllustrator
description: Add illustrate_page_with_qa method with retry loop

title: Update run_api.py uvicorn target path
description: In cli/run_api.py, change uvicorn target from 'src.api.main:app' to 'backend.api.main:app'.

title: Update Makefile paths for new structure
description: Update Makefile: Line 57 'from src.config' → 'from backend.config', Line 58 'from src.programs.story_generator' → 'from backend.core.programs.story_generator', Line 75 'python -m src.optimization.optimize_page_writer' → 'python -m backend.optimization.optimize_page_writer'. Also update scripts/ references to cli/.

title: Complete signatures/__init__.py exports
description:
Add missing signature exports:
- CharacterBibleSignature
- IllustrationStyleSignature
- PageCritiqueSignature
- PageRevisionSignature
These are used by outline_generator.py and page_generator.py but not exported from the package.

title: Set up project directory structure
description: Create src/signatures, src/modules, src/programs, src/metrics, src/optimization, data/, optimized/, scripts/ directories with __init__.py files

title: Update OutlineGenerator for spread_breakdown
description: Change page_breakdown field to spread_breakdown. 12 spreads with page-turn moments noted. Update StoryOutlineSignature docstring.

title: Update story output with illustrations
description: Modify story output to include both text and illustration for each page. Export as markdown with embedded images or structured format for layout tools.

title: Move mocks/ to docs/prototypes/ using git mv
description: Use git mv to move mocks/ directory to docs/prototypes/. Contains JSX UI prototype files: story-library.jsx, new-story.jsx, story-reader.jsx.

title: Create DSPy signatures
description: Define StoryOutlineSignature, PageWriterSignature, and StoryJudgeSignature in src/signatures/

title: Create shared UI components
description: Build components/ui/: Button, Card, ProgressBar, FloatingElement. Build components/story/: StoryCard, ThemePill. All with NativeWind + Moti animations

title: Update SpreadIllustrator for 12 images
description: Rename PageIllustrator to SpreadIllustrator. Generate 12 images (one per spread) instead of 32. Each image represents a double-page spread.

title: Create story generator program
description: Compose modules into StoryGenerator program with quality loop in src/programs/

title: Move scripts/ to cli/ using git mv
description: Use git mv to rename scripts/ directory to cli/. Contains generate_story.py, debug_page.py, run_api.py.

title: Update frontend for spread-based stories
description: Update lib/api.ts types (StoryPage → StorySpread). Update reader screen to display spreads. Update page navigation for 12 spreads.

title: Add QA dependencies (t2v-metrics, torch)
description: Add t2v-metrics for VQAScore and torch for model inference

title: Create reusable animation components
description: Build FloatingElement, BobbingCharacter, MagicParticles, Firefly components using react-native-reanimated. These will be composed in both screens.

title: Create CLI entry point
description: Build scripts/generate_story.py with argument parsing for goal input and story output

title: Create FullStorySignature for single-call generation
description: New DSPy signature that generates all 12 spreads in one LLM call. Include page-turn guidance. Output format: Spread 1: [text] through Spread 12: [text]. 300-400 words total.

title: Create Pydantic models
description: Create src/api/models/ with requests.py and responses.py

title: Implement StoryCreation screen
description: Port story-creation.jsx to app/creating/[id].tsx. Animated wizard emoji, stage progression, progress bar, poll job status via TanStack Query

title: Create new directory structure with __init__.py files
description: Create backend/, backend/core/, cli/, tests/unit/, tests/integration/, docs/prototypes/ directories. Add __init__.py files to backend/, backend/core/, tests/unit/, tests/integration/. This must be done BEFORE moving any files.

title: Add custom fonts (Nunito + Baloo 2)
description: Install expo-font, load Nunito and Baloo 2 fonts, create font family constants for use across the app

title: Update all Python imports from src.* to backend.*
description: Update imports in: tests/conftest.py (6 imports), tests/test_api_stories.py (2), tests/test_page_illustrator.py (2), tests/test_image_extraction.py (1), llm_evals/test_image_generation.py (4), scripts/generate_story.py (2), scripts/debug_page.py (3), src/optimization/optimize_page_writer.py (4). Change src.api.* → backend.api.*, src.modules.* → backend.core.modules.*, src.programs.* → backend.core.programs.*, src.signatures.* → backend.core.signatures.*, src.types → backend.core.types, src.config → backend.config.

title: Update types: StoryPage → StorySpread
description: Rename StoryPage to StorySpread in backend/core/types.py. Change page_number to spread_number. Update word count expectations (25-40 per spread). Update GeneratedStory to reference spreads.

title: Create character reference sheet generator
description: New module that generates 4-view turnaround sheets (front, side, back, 3/4) for each character using gpt-image-1. Store images with outline.

title: Rename SRC_DIR to BACKEND_DIR in api/config.py
description: In backend/api/config.py, rename the misleading variable SRC_DIR to BACKEND_DIR for clarity. The path calculation still works, just the name is wrong.

title: Create GEPA-compatible metrics
description: Build feedback-rich metrics for outline quality, page quality, and overall story quality in src/metrics/

title: Clean stale __pycache__ files
description: Remove stale bytecode files, particularly src/__pycache__/config.cpython-311.pyc from the old config.py. Run: find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} +

title: Implement NewStory screen
description: Port new-story.jsx to app/new.tsx. Text/voice input toggle, theme picker pills, inspiration prompt, 'Create My Story' button

title: Remove pointless __init__.py files
description:
Remove near-empty __init__.py files that serve no purpose:
- scripts/__init__.py (just a comment, scripts/ not imported as package)
- src/optimization/__init__.py (just a comment, run as module not imported)

title: Move llm_evals/ to tests/integration/ using git mv
description: Use git mv to move contents of llm_evals/ into tests/integration/. Check for fixture name conflicts with tests/unit/conftest.py. Includes conftest.py, test_image_generation.py, __init__.py.

title: Update CLAUDE.md with new project structure
description: Update the Project Structure section in CLAUDE.md to reflect the new directory layout: backend/, frontend/, cli/, tests/unit/, tests/integration/, etc.

title: Set up TanStack Query + Zustand
description: Install @tanstack/react-query v5, zustand. Create QueryClientProvider in root layout, create API client for FastAPI backend

title: Remove non-illustrated story support
description: Remove SIMPLE and STANDARD generation modes, keeping only ILLUSTRATED. This simplifies the codebase by removing branching logic for non-illustrated stories.

title: Move tests/ to tests/unit/ using git mv
description: Use git mv to move contents of tests/ into tests/unit/. Includes conftest.py, test_api_stories.py, test_page_illustrator.py, test_image_extraction.py, __init__.py.

title: Set up Reanimated v3 + Moti
description: Install react-native-reanimated@3.x, moti. Configure babel plugin. Port float/wiggle/pageIn animations from prototypes

title: Remove unused imports in story_generator.py
description: Remove STORY_CONSTANTS and get_default_lm imports - neither is used in the file

title: Children's Story Generator MVP
description: Build an AI agent that generates high-quality children's picture books from brief goals/themes using DSPy and GEPA optimization. Pipeline: Outline → Pages → Quality Judge → Iterate

title: Create page illustrator module
description: New module using gpt-image-1 images.edit() with character reference images + illustration prompt + locked style params to generate page illustrations

title: Rewrite page_illustrator for Nano Banana Pro
description: Replace gpt-image-1 edit endpoint with Nano Banana Pro multimodal prompts. Pass all character reference images (up to 14) plus scene description in single generate_content call.
